newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: CONSENSUS - Reuters survey of NZ economic forecasts.
newsitem.headline: CONSENSUS - Reuters survey of NZ economic forecasts.

text.p: The following New Zealand economic indicators are scheduled for this week. Times are GMT.
DAY TIME INDICATOR PERIOD AVG F/CAST PREVIOUS
Wed 2245 Terms of trade (a) Mar qtr +0.52 pct -1.5 pct
Terms of trade (b) Yr to Mar -2.03 pct -3.5 pct
Export price index (c) Mar qtr -0.6 pct -3.1 pct
Export price index (d) Yr to Mar -6.43 pct -7.0 pct
Import price index (e) Mar qtr -1.25 pct -1.5 pct
Import price index (f) Yr to Mar -4.5 pct -3.6 pct
Thu 2245 Ordinary time average hourly earnings
- Total (g) Feb qtr +1.0 pct +0.7 pct
- Total (h) Yr to Feb +3.58 pct +3.5 pct
- Public sector (i) Feb qtr +0.92 pct +1.5 pct
- Public sector (j) Yr to Feb +4.3 pct +3.6 pct
Fri 2245 Food Price Index (k) May -0.01 pct +0.1 pct
Food Price Index (l) Yr to May +2.65 pct +3.4 pct
Further information:
FORECAST NO OF RESPONDENTS MEDIAN RANGE

Respondents to the survey were: AMP Investments (NZ) Ltd, ANZ Bank, ASB Bank, Bancorp, Bankers Trust NZ, Deutsche Morgan Grenfell, Doyle Paterson Brown, First NZ Capital, Garlick and Co Ltd, National Bank, SBC Warburg.
--Wellington Newsroom (64 4) 4734746
